T·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a trong Khoa h·ªçc D·ªØ li·ªáu

Trang ch·ªß 00. C√°c Kh√°i Ni·ªám To√°n H·ªçc C∆° B·∫£n 01. Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu 02. T·∫≠p L·ªìi 03. H√†m L·ªìi 04. C∆° b·∫£n v·ªÅ T·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a L·ªìi 05. C√°c B√†i To√°n Chu·∫©n 06. Gradient Descent 07. T·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a trong Khoa h·ªçc D·ªØ li·ªáu

Chuy·ªÉn sang ti·∫øng Anh

05-02-01 B√†i To√°n B√¨nh Ph∆∞∆°ng T·ªëi Thi·ªÉu Tuy·∫øn T√≠nh B·∫Øt bu·ªôc

B√†i To√°n B√¨nh Ph∆∞∆°ng T·ªëi Thi·ªÉu Tuy·∫øn T√≠nh

B√†i to√°n b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng t·ªëi thi·ªÉu tuy·∫øn t√≠nh l√† m·ªôt b√†i to√°n t·ªëi ∆∞u kh√¥ng c√≥ r√†ng bu·ªôc, trong ƒë√≥ ch√∫ng ta t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a t·ªïng c√°c sai s·ªë b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng:

\[\text{minimize}_{x} \quad f_0(x) = \|Ax - b\|_2^2 = \sum_{i=1}^{k} (a_i^T x - b_i)^2\]

trong ƒë√≥:

  • \(A \in \mathbb{R}^{k \times n}\) l√† m·ªôt ma tr·∫≠n v·ªõi \(k \geq n\)
  • \(a_i^T\) l√† c√°c h√†ng c·ªßa \(A\)
  • \(x \in \mathbb{R}^n\) l√† bi·∫øn ch√∫ng ta mu·ªën t√¨m
  • \(b \in \mathbb{R}^k\) l√† vector m·ª•c ti√™u

M·ª•c ti√™u: T√¨m \(x\) ƒë·ªÉ t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a t·ªïng c√°c ph·∫ßn d∆∞ b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng.

V√≠ d·ª•: H·ªìi quy Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh v·ªõi h√†m m·ªôt bi·∫øn

T√¨m ƒë∆∞·ªùng th·∫≥ng kh·ªõp nh·∫•t \(y = mx + c\) ƒëi qua c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu. Ch√∫ng ta t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a t·ªïng c√°c kho·∫£ng c√°ch th·∫≥ng ƒë·ª©ng b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng t·ª´ c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm ƒë·∫øn ƒë∆∞·ªùng th·∫≥ng.

M·ª•c ti√™u: T√¨m \(m, c\).

Minh h·ªça H·ªìi quy Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh T∆∞∆°ng t√°c

H∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n: Nh·∫•p v√†o canvas ƒë·ªÉ th√™m c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu. ƒê∆∞·ªùng th·∫≥ng ƒë·ªè hi·ªÉn th·ªã ƒë∆∞·ªùng kh·ªõp nh·∫•t.

Tham s·ªë H·ªìi quy
H·ªá s·ªë g√≥c (m): 0.000
Tung ƒë·ªô g·ªëc (c): 0.000
ƒêi·ªÉm R¬≤: N/A
MSE: N/A
Ph∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh
y = 0.000x + 0.000
C√¥ng th·ª©c To√°n h·ªçc

M·ª•c ti√™u: T·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a t·ªïng c√°c ph·∫ßn d∆∞ b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng

S(m,c) = Œ£(y·µ¢ - mx·µ¢ - c)¬≤

Nghi·ªám:

m = Œ£(x·µ¢-xÃÑ)(y·µ¢-»≥) / Œ£(x·µ¢-xÃÑ)¬≤
c = »≥ - mxÃÑ

B√†i to√°n: Cho \(n\) ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu \((x_1, y_1), (x_2, y_2), \ldots, (x_n, y_n)\), t√¨m ƒë∆∞·ªùng th·∫≥ng \(y = mx + c\) t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a t·ªïng c√°c kho·∫£ng c√°ch th·∫≥ng ƒë·ª©ng b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng t·ª´ c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm ƒë·∫øn ƒë∆∞·ªùng th·∫≥ng.

H√†m M·ª•c ti√™u: Ch√∫ng ta mu·ªën t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a \(S(m,c) = \sum_{i=1}^{n} (y_i - mx_i - c)^2\)

Nghi·ªám: ƒê·ªÉ t√¨m c·ª±c ti·ªÉu, ch√∫ng ta l·∫•y ƒë·∫°o h√†m ri√™ng v√† cho b·∫±ng kh√¥ng.

L·∫•y ƒë·∫°o h√†m ri√™ng theo \(c\):

\[\frac{\partial S}{\partial c} = \sum_{i=1}^{n} 2(y_i - mx_i - c)(-1) = -2\sum_{i=1}^{n} (y_i - mx_i - c) = 0\]

ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y cho ta: \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} y_i = m\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i + nc\)

Do ƒë√≥:

\[c = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n} y_i - m\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = \bar{y} - m\bar{x}\]

trong ƒë√≥ \(\bar{x}\) v√† \(\bar{y}\) l√† gi√° tr·ªã trung b√¨nh c·ªßa c√°c gi√° tr·ªã \(x\) v√† \(y\).

L·∫•y ƒë·∫°o h√†m ri√™ng theo \(m\):

\[\frac{\partial S}{\partial m} = \sum_{i=1}^{n} 2(y_i - mx_i - c)(-x_i) = -2\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i(y_i - mx_i - c) = 0\]

Thay th·∫ø \(c = \bar{y} - m\bar{x}\): \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i(y_i - mx_i - \bar{y} + m\bar{x}) = 0\)

S·∫Øp x·∫øp l·∫°i: \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_iy_i - m\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i^2 - \bar{y}\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i + m\bar{x}\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = 0\)

V√¨ \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = n\bar{x}\) v√† \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_iy_i - \bar{y}\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = \sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i(y_i - \bar{y})\):

\[\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i(y_i - \bar{y}) = m\left(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i^2 - n\bar{x}^2\right)\]

L∆∞u √Ω r·∫±ng \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i^2 - n\bar{x}^2 = \sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})^2\)

Do ƒë√≥:

\[m = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})^2} = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})^2}\]

K·∫øt qu·∫£ Cu·ªëi c√πng: ƒê∆∞·ªùng th·∫≥ng kh·ªõp nh·∫•t c√≥ c√°c tham s·ªë:

\[\boxed{m = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})^2} \quad \text{v√†} \quad c = \bar{y} - m\bar{x}}\]

ƒê√¢y l√† nghi·ªám b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng t·ªëi thi·ªÉu kinh ƒëi·ªÉn cho h·ªìi quy tuy·∫øn t√≠nh, c≈©ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·∫øt ƒë·∫øn v·ªõi t√™n g·ªçi Ph∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh Chu·∫©n.

Nghi·ªám T·ªëi ∆∞u c·ªßa H·ªìi quy Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh v·ªõi h√†m nhi·ªÅu bi·∫øn

Ph√°t bi·ªÉu B√†i to√°n:

Trong H·ªìi quy Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh, ch√∫ng ta mu·ªën t√¨m m·ªôt vector c√°c h·ªá s·ªë \(\mathbf{w}\) kh·ªõp nh·∫•t v·ªõi m·ªôt m√¥ h√¨nh tuy·∫øn t√≠nh cho m·ªôt t·∫≠p d·ªØ li·ªáu cho tr∆∞·ªõc. Ch√∫ng ta c√≥ \(n\) ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu, m·ªói ƒëi·ªÉm c√≥ \(p\) ƒë·∫∑c tr∆∞ng.

G·ªçi \(X\) l√† ma tr·∫≠n thi·∫øt k·∫ø k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc \(n \times p\), trong ƒë√≥ m·ªói h√†ng ƒë·∫°i di·ªán cho m·ªôt ƒëi·ªÉm d·ªØ li·ªáu v√† m·ªói c·ªôt ƒë·∫°i di·ªán cho m·ªôt ƒë·∫∑c tr∆∞ng.

G·ªçi \(\mathbf{y}\) l√† vector c√°c gi√° tr·ªã m·ª•c ti√™u k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc \(n \times 1\).

M√¥ h√¨nh tuy·∫øn t√≠nh c·ªßa ch√∫ng ta d·ª± ƒëo√°n c√°c gi√° tr·ªã m·ª•c ti√™u \(\hat{\mathbf{y}}\) nh∆∞: \(\hat{\mathbf{y}} = X\mathbf{w}\) trong ƒë√≥ \(\mathbf{w}\) l√† vector c√°c h·ªá s·ªë ch∆∞a bi·∫øt k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc \(p \times 1\).

H√†m M·ª•c ti√™u (H√†m Chi ph√≠):

M·ª•c ti√™u l√† t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a t·ªïng c√°c sai s·ªë b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng (ph·∫ßn d∆∞) gi·ªØa c√°c gi√° tr·ªã m·ª•c ti√™u th·ª±c t·∫ø \(\mathbf{y}\) v√† c√°c gi√° tr·ªã d·ª± ƒëo√°n \(\hat{\mathbf{y}}\). ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·∫øt ƒë·∫øn v·ªõi t√™n g·ªçi h√†m m·ª•c ti√™u B√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng T·ªëi thi·ªÉu Th√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng (OLS): \(J(\mathbf{w}) = \sum_{i=1}^{n} (y_i - \hat{y}_i)^2 = \| \mathbf{y} - X\mathbf{w} \|^2\)

Ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ bi·ªÉu di·ªÖn ƒëi·ªÅu n√†y d∆∞·ªõi d·∫°ng ma tr·∫≠n b·∫±ng c√°ch khai tri·ªÉn chu·∫©n Euclidean b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng: \(J(\mathbf{w}) = (\mathbf{y} - X\mathbf{w})^{\text{T}}(\mathbf{y} - X\mathbf{w})\)

Khai tri·ªÉn bi·ªÉu th·ª©c n√†y: \(J(\mathbf{w}) = \mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y} - \mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w} - (X\mathbf{w})^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y} + (X\mathbf{w})^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w}\)

S·ª≠ d·ª•ng t√≠nh ch·∫•t \((AB)^{\text{T}} = B^{\text{T}}A^{\text{T}}\), ch√∫ng ta c√≥ \((X\mathbf{w})^{\text{T}} = \mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}\).

Ngo√†i ra, v√¨ \(\mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w}\) l√† m·ªôt s·ªë v√¥ h∆∞·ªõng, chuy·ªÉn v·ªã c·ªßa n√≥ ch√≠nh l√† n√≥: \((\mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w})^{\text{T}} = \mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\).

Do ƒë√≥, hai s·ªë h·∫°ng ·ªü gi·ªØa l√† gi·ªëng nhau: \(J(\mathbf{w}) = \mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y} - 2\mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y} + \mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w}\)

T·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Gi·∫£i t√≠ch:

ƒê·ªÉ t√¨m \(\mathbf{w}\) t·ªëi ∆∞u t·ªëi thi·ªÉu h√≥a \(J(\mathbf{w})\), ch√∫ng ta l·∫•y ƒë·∫°o h√†m c·ªßa \(J(\mathbf{w})\) theo \(\mathbf{w}\) v√† cho b·∫±ng kh√¥ng. Ch√∫ng ta s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c quy t·∫Øc gi·∫£i t√≠ch ma tr·∫≠n sau:

  1. \[\frac{\partial (\mathbf{a}^{\text{T}}\mathbf{x})}{\partial \mathbf{x}} = \mathbf{a}\]
  2. \(\frac{\partial (\mathbf{x}^{\text{T}}A\mathbf{x})}{\partial \mathbf{x}} = (A + A^{\text{T}})\mathbf{x}\) (N·∫øu \(A\) ƒë·ªëi x·ª©ng, ƒëi·ªÅu n√†y ƒë∆∞·ª£c r√∫t g·ªçn th√†nh \(2A\mathbf{x}\))

√Åp d·ª•ng c√°c quy t·∫Øc n√†y cho \(J(\mathbf{w})\): \(\frac{\partial J(\mathbf{w})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = \frac{\partial (\mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} - \frac{\partial (2\mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} + \frac{\partial (\mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w})}{\partial \mathbf{w}}\)

H√£y t√≠nh t·ª´ng s·ªë h·∫°ng:

  • \(\frac{\partial (\mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = 0\) (v√¨ \(\mathbf{y}^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\) l√† m·ªôt h·∫±ng s·ªë v√¥ h∆∞·ªõng ƒë·ªëi v·ªõi \(\mathbf{w}\))
  • \(\frac{\partial (2\mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = 2X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\) (s·ª≠ d·ª•ng quy t·∫Øc 1, v·ªõi \(\mathbf{a} = X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\))

  • ƒê·ªëi v·ªõi s·ªë h·∫°ng th·ª© ba, ƒë·∫∑t \(A = X^{\text{T}}X\). L∆∞u √Ω r·∫±ng \(A\) l√† ma tr·∫≠n ƒë·ªëi x·ª©ng v√¨ \((X^{\text{T}}X)^{\text{T}} = X^{\text{T}}(X^{\text{T}})^{\text{T}} = X^{\text{T}}X\).

    V·∫≠y, \(\frac{\partial (\mathbf{w}^{\text{T}}X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = 2X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w}\) (s·ª≠ d·ª•ng quy t·∫Øc 2 cho ma tr·∫≠n ƒë·ªëi x·ª©ng \(A\))

K·∫øt h·ª£p c√°c th√†nh ph·∫ßn n√†y, ƒë·∫°o h√†m l√†:

\[\frac{\partial J(\mathbf{w})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = 0 - 2X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y} + 2X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w} = 2X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w} - 2X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\]

T√¨m Nghi·ªám T·ªëi ∆∞u:

ƒê·ªÉ t√¨m c·ª±c ti·ªÉu c·ªßa \(J(\mathbf{w})\), ch√∫ng ta cho ƒë·∫°o h√†m b·∫±ng kh√¥ng:

\[\frac{\partial J(\mathbf{w})}{\partial \mathbf{w}} = 2X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w} - 2X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y} = 0\]

Chia cho 2 v√† s·∫Øp x·∫øp l·∫°i: \(X^{\text{T}}X\mathbf{w} = X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\)

ƒê√¢y ƒë∆∞·ª£c g·ªçi l√† Ph∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh Chu·∫©n. N·∫øu \(X^{\text{T}}X\) kh·∫£ ngh·ªãch (ƒëi·ªÅu n√†y x·∫£y ra khi \(X\) c√≥ h·∫°ng c·ªôt ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß), ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ gi·∫£i ƒë·ªÉ t√¨m \(\mathbf{w}\):

\[\boxed{\mathbf{w}^* = (X^{\text{T}}X)^{-1}X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}}\]

ƒê√¢y l√† nghi·ªám d·∫°ng ƒë√≥ng cho h·ªìi quy b√¨nh ph∆∞∆°ng t·ªëi thi·ªÉu tuy·∫øn t√≠nh, c√≤n ƒë∆∞·ª£c g·ªçi l√† nghi·ªám Ph∆∞∆°ng tr√¨nh Chu·∫©n.

T√≠nh ch·∫•t Quan tr·ªçng:

  1. T√≠nh duy nh·∫•t: N·∫øu \(X^{\text{T}}X\) kh·∫£ ngh·ªãch, nghi·ªám l√† duy nh·∫•t.
  2. √ù nghƒ©a H√¨nh h·ªçc: Nghi·ªám \(\mathbf{w}^*\) l√†m cho vector ph·∫ßn d∆∞ \(\mathbf{y} - X\mathbf{w}^*\) vu√¥ng g√≥c v·ªõi kh√¥ng gian c·ªôt c·ªßa \(X\).
  3. ƒê·ªô ph·ª©c t·∫°p T√≠nh to√°n: \(O(p^3 + np^2)\) trong ƒë√≥ \(n\) l√† s·ªë m·∫´u v√† \(p\) l√† s·ªë ƒë·∫∑c tr∆∞ng.

Khi \(X^{\text{T}}X\) kh√¥ng kh·∫£ ngh·ªãch:

  • ƒêi·ªÅu n√†y x·∫£y ra khi \(X\) kh√¥ng c√≥ h·∫°ng c·ªôt ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß (t·ª©c l√† m·ªôt s·ªë ƒë·∫∑c tr∆∞ng ph·ª• thu·ªôc tuy·∫øn t√≠nh)
  • Trong tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p n√†y, ch√∫ng ta c√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ngh·ªãch ƒë·∫£o gi·∫£ Moore-Penrose: \(\mathbf{w}^* = X^{\dagger}\mathbf{y}\)
  • Ho·∫∑c th√™m ƒëi·ªÅu chu·∫©n h√≥a (Ridge regression): \(\mathbf{w}^* = (X^{\text{T}}X + \lambda I)^{-1}X^{\text{T}}\mathbf{y}\)

Hi·ªáu su·∫•t:

  • ƒê·ªô ph·ª©c t·∫°p th·ªùi gian: kho·∫£ng \(n^2k\) ph√©p to√°n
  • M·ªôt m√°y t√≠nh ti√™u chu·∫©n gi·∫£i quy·∫øt c√°c b√†i to√°n v·ªõi h√†ng trƒÉm bi·∫øn v√† h√†ng ngh√¨n s·ªë h·∫°ng trong v√†i gi√¢y
  • Ma tr·∫≠n th∆∞a (nhi·ªÅu ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ b·∫±ng kh√¥ng) c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c gi·∫£i nhanh h∆°n nhi·ªÅu

V√≠ d·ª•: M·ªôt ma tr·∫≠n th∆∞a ƒë·ªÉ x·ª≠ l√Ω ·∫£nh c√≥ th·ªÉ ch·ªâ c√≥ 5 ph·∫ßn t·ª≠ kh√°c kh√¥ng tr√™n m·ªói h√†ng trong ma tr·∫≠n 10,000 √ó 10,000.
